info.title: client-individuals-name
info.description:
This is a system level API that updates the client name for individuals

#### Service Functionality
This API is called with a {clientId} parameter. If successful, the resultant is a HTTP 200 status code.

#### Diagrams
TBD

#### Performance Expectation
Standard SLA applies.

#### Service Capacity Supported
Standard Capacity applies

#### Suggested Test Scenario
TBD

#### Service Availability
Standard Service Availability applies

#### Service Security
HTTPS/SSL

post.description: For a given clientId, corrects the client name for individual client type.

parameters.name: personInfo
parameters.description: The desired person name information for this operation

put.description: For a given clientId, changes the client name for individual client type.

parameters.name: personInfo
parameters.description: The desired person name information for this operation
